typeCheck.details: TypeScript compilation successful with no errors

integrationTests.notes: 39 failures are in worktree-detail-integration.test.tsx due to Next.js router mocking issue (invariant expected app router to be mounted). This is a pre-existing test infrastructure issue, NOT related to Issue #19 memo functionality. All memo-related integration tests (24 tests) passed.

acceptanceCriteria.evidence: tests/unit/components/worktree/LeftPaneTabSwitcher.test.tsx - 22 tests passed including 'should render tab buttons for history, files, and memo'

acceptanceCriteria.description: Desktop: Memo tab click shows memo list
acceptanceCriteria.evidence: tests/unit/components/worktree/MemoPane.test.tsx - 20 tests passed including 'should fetch memos on mount' and 'should display each memo as MemoCard'
tests/unit/components/worktree/MemoAddButton.test.tsx - 18 tests passed including 'should call onAdd when clicked'; tests/unit/components/worktree/MemoPane.test.tsx includes add memo tests
tests/unit/components/worktree/MemoCard.test.tsx - 17 tests passed including 'should allow editing title' and 'should allow editing content in textarea'
tests/unit/hooks/useAutoSave.test.ts - 13 tests passed including 'should call saveFn after 300ms debounce when value changes'

tests/unit/components/worktree/MemoCard.test.tsx - includes 'should render delete button' and 'should call onDelete when delete button is clicked'; tests/unit/components/worktree/MemoPane.test.tsx includes delete memo handling
tests/integration/api/memos.test.ts - 24 tests passed including 'should return 400 when memo limit (5) exceeded'
tests/unit/components/worktree/MemoAddButton.test.tsx - includes 'should be disabled when currentCount equals maxCount' and 'should not call onAdd when disabled'
tests/unit/components/mobile/MobileTabBar.test.tsx - 31 tests passed including 'should render all five tabs' (terminal, history, files, memo, info)

acceptanceCriteria.description: Mobile: Memo tab shows memo list
acceptanceCriteria.evidence: tests/unit/components/worktree/MemoPane.test.tsx - MemoPane component works in both desktop and mobile contexts
src/lib/__tests__/db-migrations-v10.test.ts - 10 tests passed including 'should create worktree_memos table', 'should migrate existing memo data from worktrees table', and data migration tests

summary: All acceptance criteria for Issue #19 (Memo Function Improvement) have been verified and passed. Quality checks show: ESLint (0 errors), TypeScript (0 errors), Unit Tests (802 passed), Build (successful). Integration test failures (39) are unrelated to this issue - they are pre-existing issues in worktree-detail-integration.test.tsx due to Next.js router mocking. All 24 memo-specific integration tests passed. The memo functionality is fully implemented with: tab-based access on both desktop and mobile, CRUD operations, auto-save with 300ms debounce, 5-memo limit enforcement, and database migration for existing data.
